assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Zhongshan Public Utilities Group Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the environmental protection water affairs, solid waste treatment, engineering construction, and auxiliary businesses in China and internationally. It is involved in the urban water supply, sewage treatment, garbage disposal, and port passenger transportation activities; and waste disposal, leakage treatment, and power generation activities. The company also undertakes municipal public construction, pipeline engineering, fire protection facility engineering, mechanical and electrical equipment installation engineering, building decoration, decoration engineering, and urban projects. In addition, it offers waste incineration power generation and leachate treatment services; security brokerage and investment consulting services; financial advisory services related to security trading and investment services; and security underwriting and sponsorship services. The company was formerly known as Zhongshan Public Utilities Science and Technology Company Limited and changed its name to Zhongshan Public Utilities Group Co.,Ltd. in August 2008. Zhongshan Public Utilities Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Zhongshan, China.
